  • Method Details

    • createPublicationType

      void createPublicationType(PublicationType publicationType) throws PublicationTypeNameExistsException
      Create the given instance of the publicationType.
      Parameters:
      publicationType - The publicationType to be created
      Throws:
      ServiceException - When the publicationType is already persistent
      PublicationTypeNameExistsException

    • readPublicationType

      PublicationType readPublicationType(Long id) throws ServiceException
      Loads the publicationType with the given id from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the publicationType to be read
      Returns:
      the publicationType with the given id
      Throws:
      ServiceException - in case the given id does not exist

    • updatePublicationType

      PublicationType updatePublicationType(PublicationType publicationType) throws ServiceException
      Update an existing publicationType.
      Parameters:
      publicationType - that should be updated
      Returns:
      the updated publicationType
      Throws:
      ServiceException - when the publication type is in a transient state
      PublicationTypeNameExistsException - when a publication type with the same name as value already exists to avoid persisting duplicate publication types

    • deletePublicationType

      void deletePublicationType(Long id) throws ServiceException, ModelUsedException
      Delete an PublicationType.
      Parameters:
      id - primary id
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if there is no publicationType with the given id
      ModelUsedException

    • findAllPublicationTypes

      List<PublicationType> findAllPublicationTypes()
      Load all publicationTypes
      Returns:
      a list of publicationTypes. Empty if no one exists
